name: Emily Tran
background: Emily grew up in Seattle and has a background in environmental science. She's an amateur photographer, and a lover of all things botanical. Raised in a multicultural household, she's fluent in both English and Vietnamese.
life_experiences: Organized campus sustainability initiatives in college
Took a solo trip across Southeast Asia to reconnect with her heritage
Helped launch a nonprofit for urban gardening
Lived off-grid for a year in the Pacific Northwest
